languages.text: Вторая ключевая {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g}, {g|f:4d2f2a839d2340388d45cf4cf66c947b}Стойкость{/g}, дает временное здоровье и снижает входящие повреждения на (1 + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} / 2). {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Героический акт{/g} воина мгновенно восстанавливает ему все {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} и (2 × бонус {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g}) {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}, а также снимает ограничение на количество атак в этот {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}. Важные {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристики{/g} воина: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближний Бой{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Сила{/g}, Выносливость, Ловкость. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Навыки{/g} воина: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Напор{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Атлетика{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Устойчивость{/g}. Воины могут стать {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}авангардами{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}ассасинами{/g} или архмилитантами.

The Warrior's second keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, {g|f:4d2f2a839d2340388d45cf4cf66c947b}Endure{/g}, grants them {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} and reduces all incoming {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} by −(1 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} / 2). The Warrior's {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} instantly restores all their {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}, grants them +(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} bonus) {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, and removes the attack limit for the current {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, Toughness, Agility. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Carouse{/g}. Warriors can become {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguards{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassins{/g}, or Arch-Militants.
languages.original_text: Вторая ключевая способность, Стойкость, дает временные очки здоровья и снижает входящие повреждения на (1 + бонус ВЫН / 2). Героический акт воина мгновенно восстанавливает ему все ОД и (2 × бонус ЛОВ) ОП, а также снимает ограничение на количество атак в этот ход. Важные характеристики воина: Ближний Бой, Сила, Выносливость, Ловкость. Навыки воина: Напор, Атлетика, Устойчивость. Воины могут стать авангардами, ассасинами или ветеранами.

traits.locale_text: The Fighter's second keystone ability, Endure, grants them temporary wounds and reduces all incoming damage by −(1 + TGH bonus / 2). The Fighter's heroic act instantly restores all their AP, grants them (2 × AGI bonus) MP, and removes the attack limit for the current turn. Key characteristics: Weapon Skill, Strength, Toughness, Agility. Skills: Coercion, Athletics, Carouse. Fighters can become Vanguards, Assassins, or Veterans.

The Fighter's second keystone ability, Endure, grants them temporary wounds and reduces all incoming damage by −(1 + TGH bonus / 2). The Fighter's heroic act instantly restores all their AP, grants them (2 × AGI bonus) MP, and removes the attack limit for the current turn. Key characteristics: Weapon Skill, Strength, Toughness, Agility. Skills: Coercion, Athletics, Carouse. Fighters can become Vanguards, Assassins, or Veterans.

Key characteristics: Weapon Skill, Strength, Toughness, Agility. Skills: Coercion, Athletics, Carouse. Fighters can become Vanguards, Assassins, or Veterans.

The Warrior's second keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, Endure, grants them {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} and reduces all incoming {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} by −(1 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} / 2). The Warrior's {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} instantly restores all their {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}, grants them +(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} bonus) {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, and removes the attack limit for the current {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, Toughness, Agility. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Carouse{/g}. Warriors can become {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguards{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassins{/g}, or Arch-Militants.

The Warrior's second keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, Endure, grants them {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} and reduces all incoming {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} by −(1 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} / 2). The Warrior's {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} instantly restores all their {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}, grants them +(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} bonus) {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, and removes the attack limit for the current {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, Toughness, Agility. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Carouse{/g}. Warriors can become {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguards{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassins{/g}, or Arch-Militants.

languages.text: Die zweite Grundstein-{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} des Kriegers, {g|f:4d2f2a839d2340388d45cf4cf66c947b}Ertragen{/g}, gewährt ihm {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporäre Wunden{/g} und +({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} / 2) {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Deflektion{/g}. Die {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentat{/g} des Kriegers stellt sofort all seine {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} wieder her, gewährt ihm +(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g}-Bonus) {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} und entfernt für den laufenden {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} das Angriffslimit. Schlüssel-{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g}, Zähigkeit, Beweglichkeit. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Fertigkeiten{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Zwang{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletik{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Zechen{/g}. Krieger können zu Angehörigen der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVeteranGlossary}Erzmilitanten{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassinen{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Henker{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vorhut{/g} werden.

Krieger können zu Angehörigen der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vorhut{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassinen{/g} oder Erzmilitanten werden.

Die zweite Grundstein-{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} des Kriegers, Ertragen, gewährt ihm {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporäre Wunden{/g} und reduziert jeglichen eingehenden {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} um −(1 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} / 2). languages.text: La deuxième {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} clé du guerrier, {g|f:4d2f2a839d2340388d45cf4cf66c947b}Supporter{/g}, lui confère des {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g} et réduit tous les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} subis de −(1 + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g} / 2). L'{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acte héroïque{/g} du guerrier restaure instantanément tous ses {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}points d'action{/g}, lui confère +(2 × bonus d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g}) {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}points de déplacement{/g}, et supprime la limite d'attaque du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} en cours. {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Caractéristiques{/g} clés : {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Compétence d'arme{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g}, Endurance, Agilité. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Compétences{/g} : {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercition{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athlétisme{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Résistance aux intoxications{/g}. Les guerriers peuvent devenir des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}patrouilleurs{/g}, des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}assassins{/g} des ou archimilitants.

The Warrior's {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} instantly restores all their {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}, grants them +(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} bonus) {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, and removes the attack limit for the current {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, Toughness, Agility. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Carouse{/g}. Warriors can become {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVeteranGlossary}Arch-Militants{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassins{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioners{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguards{/g}.

traits.locale_text: La deuxième {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} clé du guerrier, {g|f:4d2f2a839d2340388d45cf4cf66c947b}Supporter{/g}, lui confère des {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g} et réduit tous les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} subis de −(1 + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g} / 2). L'{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acte héroïque{/g} du guerrier restaure instantanément tous ses {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}points d'action{/g}, lui confère +(2 × bonus d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g}) {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}points de déplacement{/g}, et supprime la limite d'attaque du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} en cours. {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Caractéristiques{/g} clés : {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Compétence d'arme{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g}, Endurance, Agilité. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Compétences{/g} : {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercition{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athlétisme{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Résistance aux intoxications{/g}. Les guerriers peuvent devenir des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}patrouilleurs{/g}, des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}assassins{/g} des ou archimilitants.

La deuxième {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} clé du combattant, {g|f:4d2f2a839d2340388d45cf4cf66c947b}Supporter{/g}, lui confère des {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g} et réduit tous les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} subis de −(1 + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g} / 2). L'{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acte héroïque{/g} du guerrier restaure instantanément tous ses {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}points d'action{/g}, lui confère +(2 × bonus d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g}) {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}points de déplacement{/g}, et supprime la limite d'attaque du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} en cours. {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Caractéristiques{/g} clés : {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Compétence d'arme{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g}, Endurance, Agilité. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Compétences{/g} : {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercition{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athlétisme{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Résistance aux intoxications{/g}. Les guerriers peuvent devenir des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}patrouilleurs{/g}, des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}assassins{/g} des ou archimilitants.

languages.text: 战士的第二个关键{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}：{g|f:4d2f2a839d2340388d45cf4cf66c947b}隐忍待发{/g}，可以获得临时{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}生命值{/g}，同时使承受的所有{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}降低（1+{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}/2）点。 战士的{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}可以立刻恢复所有{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}，额外获得（2×{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}加值）点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，同时无视当前{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}的攻击次数限制。 关键{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}：{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}、坚韧、敏捷。 {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}技能{/g}：{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}胁迫{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}运动{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}饮酒{/g}。 战士可以晋级为{g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}先锋{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}刺客{/g}或首席战士。
languages.original_text: The Warrior's second keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, {g|f:4d2f2a839d2340388d45cf4cf66c947b}Endure{/g}, grants them {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} and reduces all incoming {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} by −(1 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} / 2). The Warrior's {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} instantly restores all their {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}, grants them +(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} bonus) {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, and removes the attack limit for the current {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, Toughness, Agility. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Carouse{/g}. Warriors can become {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguards{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassins{/g}, or Arch-Militants.

traits.locale_text: 战士的第二个关键{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}：隐忍待发，可以获得临时{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}生命值{/g}，同时使承受的所有{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}降低（1+{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}/2）点。 战士的{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}可以立刻恢复所有{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}，额外获得（2×{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}加值）点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，同时无视当前{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}的攻击次数限制。 关键{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}：{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}、坚韧、敏捷。 {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}技能{/g}：{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}胁迫{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}运动{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}饮酒{/g}。 战士可以晋级为{g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}先锋{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}刺客{/g}或首席战士。

战士的第二个关键{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}：{g|f:4d2f2a839d2340388d45cf4cf66c947b}隐忍待发{/g}，可以获得临时{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}生命值{/g}，同时使承受的所有{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}降低（1+{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}/2）点。 战士的{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}可以立刻恢复所有{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}，额外获得（2×{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}加值）点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，同时无视当前{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}的攻击次数限制。 关键{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}：{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}、坚韧、敏捷。 {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}技能{/g}：{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}胁迫{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}运动{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}饮酒{/g}。 战士可以晋级为{g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}先锋{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}刺客{/g}或首席战士。

languages.text: La segunda {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} clave de los guerreros, {g|f:4d2f2a839d2340388d45cf4cf66c947b}Aguantar{/g}, les concede {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g} y +({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} / 2) de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g}. El {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acto heroico{/g} de los guerreros restaura al instante todos sus {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}, les concede +(2 × bonificación por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g}) {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} y elimina el límite de ataques durante el {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} actual. {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Características{/g} relevantes: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g}, Resistencia, Agilidad. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Habilidades{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coacción{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Atletismo{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Juerga{/g}. Los guerreros pueden convertirse en {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVeteranGlossary}Archimilitantes{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}asesinos{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}ejecutores{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}vanguardias{/g}.
languages.original_text: The Warrior's second keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, {g|f:4d2f2a839d2340388d45cf4cf66c947b}Endure{/g}, grants them {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} and +({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} / 2) {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}. The Warrior's {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} instantly restores all their {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}, grants them +(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} bonus) {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, and removes the attack limit for the current {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, Toughness, Agility. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Carouse{/g}. Warriors can become {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVeteranGlossary}Arch-Militants{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassins{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioners{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguards{/g}.

traits.locale_text: La segunda {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} clave de los guerreros, {g|f:4d2f2a839d2340388d45cf4cf66c947b}Aguantar{/g}, les concede {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g} y +({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} / 2) de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g}. El {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acto heroico{/g} de los guerreros restaura al instante todos sus {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}, les concede +(2 × bonificación por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g}) {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} y elimina el límite de ataques durante el {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} actual. {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Características{/g} relevantes: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g}, Resistencia, Agilidad. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Habilidades{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coacción{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Atletismo{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Juerga{/g}. Los guerreros pueden convertirse en {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVeteranGlossary}Archimilitantes{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}asesinos{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}ejecutores{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}vanguardias{/g}.

languages.original_text: The second key ability, Fortitude, grants temporary health points and reduces incoming damage by (1 + VYN bonus / 2). The warrior's heroic act instantly restores all ODs and (2 × VOH bonus) OP, and removes the limit on the number of attacks per turn. Important Warrior Traits: Melee, Strength, Stamina, Dexterity. WarriorSkills: Pressure, Athleticism, Resilience. Warriors can be Vanguards, Assassins or Veterans.

languages.text: ファイターの二番目に重要な{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}は{g|f:4d2f2a839d2340388d45cf4cf66c947b}耐久{/g}であり、これは{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時体力{/g}を獲得し、受ける{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を-(1+{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}/2)減少する。 ファイターの{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}は即座に{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}を回復し、+（2×{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}ボーナス）{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}を獲得する。また、現在の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の攻撃の制限を解除する。 主要{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}：{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}近接攻撃{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}腕力{/g}、耐久力、敏捷性。 {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}スキル{/g}：{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}強制力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}身体能力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}身体作用耐性{/g}。 ファイターは{g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}ヴァンガード{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}アサシン{/g}、またはアーク・ミリタントになることができる。
languages.original_text: The Warrior's second keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, {g|f:4d2f2a839d2340388d45cf4cf66c947b}Endure{/g}, grants them {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} and reduces all incoming {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} by −(1 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} / 2). The Warrior's {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} instantly restores all their {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}, grants them +(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} bonus) {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, and removes the attack limit for the current {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, Toughness, Agility. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skills{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Carouse{/g}. Warriors can become {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguards{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassins{/g}, or Arch-Militants.

languages.text: Savaşçı'nın ikinci kilit {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyeti{/g} olan {g|f:4d2f2a839d2340388d45cf4cf66c947b}Sebat{/g}, ona {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}geçici sağlık{/g} puanı ve +({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Dayanıklılık{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonusu{/g} / 2) {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}saptırma{/g} değeri kazandırır. Savaşçı'nın {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}kahramanca eylemi{/g}, tüm {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP'sini{/g} anında tazeler; +(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} bonusu) kadar {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g} kazandırır ve mevcut {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tur{/g} için saldırı sınırını kaldırır. Kilit {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}nitelikler{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Silah Yeteneği{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Kuvvet{/g}, Dayanıklılık, Çeviklik. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Yetenekler{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Gözdağı{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Atletizm{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Tiryakilik{/g}. Savaşçılar; {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVeteranGlossary}Başmilitan{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Suikastçı{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Cellat{/g} veya {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Öncü'ye{/g} dönüşebilirler.
